definitions.definition: A writing system of ancient Egypt , Minoans , Maya and other civilizations , using pictorial symbols to represent individual sounds as a rebus
Any symbol used in this system; a hieroglyph .

main_definition: ( chiefly in the plural ) A writing system of ancient Egypt , Minoans , Maya and other civilizations , using pictorial symbols to represent individual sounds as a rebus
secondary_definitions: Any symbol used in this system; a hieroglyph .
( by extension ) Undecipherable handwriting or secret symbol .
